description:
Compassionate, experienced and proven, our team at Kurle Justus, LLC, returns significant compensation to victims of nursing home abuse, neglect and other personal injury incidents. Our law firm in Decatur serves clients throughout Georgia who have suffered the unthinkable. We patiently listen as clients share their stories, then explain how we can help them overcome current challenges and start the road to recovery.

We have a partner who is a former respiratory therapist and puts her medical knowledge to work when holding care providers and other defendants accountable for our clients' losses. Simply put, we are uniquely qualified to guide people through even the most complex situations and toward recovery.

Clients truly come first at our law firm. This is evident through our results and the way we treat the people we serve:

• Free initial consultations and virtual appointments available
• Accessibility to our clients to respond to their concerns
• Personalized attention throughout the entire process

The attorneys at our law firm have obtained millions of dollars for clients. They hold honors that include an Avvo "Superb" rating; being included to the list of Super Lawyers; listed in The National Trial Lawyers: Top 40 under 40; and members of the Million Dollar Advocates Forum and the Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forum. As a matter of convenience, Kurle Justus, LLC, accepts credit cards.
